## Ansible-Vault

```
root@ubuntu14:~# ansible-vault create secrets.txt
New Vault password:
Confirm New Vault password:
root@ubuntu14:~# ls
secrets.txt
root@ubuntu14:~# cat secrets.txt
$ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
66396164346266393236316565626662393137633235633136666463376436373566333438316364
6530336632353530626330666563643139393436323932620a623234306634353235623663396265
32393737393866373137363330383430376336313239333662666235643035306538396562326339
3839356366623939370a356430653661316464613066346561663334373265626461666366613862
3636
root@ubuntu14:~# ansible-vault view secrets.txt
Vault password:
abc1234

root@ubuntu14:~# cat secrets.txt
$ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
31653564623361643936346331353466346266386330323561653135396566323863633739646338
3864306637643630383365636435636531373131383036660a303466636530653261316264336562
64316336333336623334323739373562653932623838656262623035386364303763313939333939
3134316436643232340a363630396363373566306662313564346566323034313163343261316537
62323965636533353563656634623130386132653533356232386331666564613762
root@ubuntu14:~# ansible-vault edit secrets.txt
Vault password:
root@ubuntu14:~# ansible-vault decrypt secrets.txt
Vault password:
Decryption successful
root@ubuntu14:~# ls
secrets.txt
root@ubuntu14:~# cat secrets.txt
abc1234
1234
abc
abc123
root@ubuntu14:~#

root@ubuntu14:~# ansible-vault encrypt secrets.txt
New Vault password:
Confirm New Vault password:
Encryption successful
root@ubuntu14:~# cat secrets.txt
$ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
61663238323966316537626239633432326536303366663137653039623537636233653336386636
6533393836316662333033306335616365663430333437630a626635316639393262643137313138
31323531616262663338653863333661326434316562623630333238633132363534663636383061
3730306164633930360a636161333064363636343538623739656632366165663662303838393833
36353732303164623864643434333731386337353031303861653166656564613535

root@ubuntu14:~# ansible-vault create secrets.txt --vault-password-file=password.txt
root@ubuntu14:~# cat secrets.txt
$ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
37613861356466653832666338313765653664636162303164306635366330663730636632373863
6662373234393737323837323431633931366165393038620a396364353539373664633636376365
35353539366530656338363836653532366162363831323239616266303561666634616333366539
3636346663333435370a613464613737316264383263393339393838386434383263656231363836
31386130306365336333613666623537653164653230393565376631366630306238
root@ubuntu14:~# ansible-vault view secrets.txt --vault-password-file=password.txt
abc123!!!
password_database
root@ubuntu14:~# ansible-vault edit secrets.txt --vault-password-file=password.txt
root@ubuntu14:~# cat secrets.txt
$ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
33633033633762303763616264653436646662643631653962366566636533383239343131373437
3139366339316162306535336338373037646237313262320a393634383966316363613962376162
34303161373436636266356361303933313562376362623566353663326230303037616338393331
3361316531353834310a653539613635373066323938353639383931653765633063366666383030
65656533393466303637363832623036393936333734323733326434383432626330393138303336
3534363863383435333436626661613635653431306464333565
root@ubuntu14:~# ansible-vault decrypt secrets.txt --vault-password-file=password.txt
Decryption successful
root@ubuntu14:~# cat secrets.txt
abc123!!!
user_database
password_database
root@ubuntu14:~# ansible-vault encrypt secrets.txt --vault-password-file=password.txt
Encryption successful
root@ubuntu14:~# cat secrets.txt
$ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
38653231306630626135336664636231623938353234306338323634633134383162633063323134
3232366563356439393231366536643564613937333564620a353563616537343330323931346165

6562383461643332623263626666346338376466353464653933
root@ubuntu14:~#
```
